snippet.title: Heartbreaker - Intro Sequence 2
snippet.description:
The first alpha teaser was rendered entirely in the game's engine, which caused severe performance issues.
Instead, I decided to have a crack at just editing it as a normal video file.
This will be replaced later in development once I can afford to commission the right assets.

https:// abyzoudev.itch.io
Heartbreaker is a retro-style visual novel, where you play as a college student in small-town Osaka, aiming to win her love interest's heart... by ANY means necessary.

The first 12 episodes will each focus on a different rival to eliminate in a multitude of ways, culminating in a final scenario in Episode 13.
You'll be able to start getting Kouhai to notice you, when the early-access alpha demo releases in February. :D

All graphics & audio here are © Abyzou Interactive™.

Throne if you want to support me directly: https:// throne.com/abyzoudev
